TF020138-PHRD-THAILAND FINANCIAL SECTOR
            ADVISORY SERVICES,TF036649-THAILAND - ECONOMIC AND
            FINANCIAL SECTOR LOAN PROJECT,TF039902-THAILAND - ECONOMIC-FINANCIAL
            SECTOR LOAN PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The ratings for the project were as
            follows: the outcome was satisfactory, the sustainability
            was likely, the institutional development impact was
            substantial, and the Bank and borrower performance were both
            satisfactory. The lessons learned indicate that overall
            strong support and ownership from the government contributed
            to the successful completion of the project. Clear ownership
            from each individual agency helped to carry out the
            anticipated reforms and ensure the outcome of the activities
            supported by the project. Close supervision by the
            Bank's task manager ensured that the project met its
            objectives and allowed the Bank to be flexible to meet the
            changing needs of the government through amendments to the
            loan. The Bank's resident staff greatly facilitated the
            implementation process while the resident procurement staff
            contributed to the smooth processing of disbursements. Close
            coordination and cooperation between the Bank and the
            Project Implementation Unit (PIU) helped to ensure the
            project was implemented according to schedule and changes
            were accommodated on a timely basis. Capacity building and
            institutional development activities have been sustained
            with continuing efforts beyond the project life by the
            agencies and ministries concerned. Time frame required for
            institutional building operations. The project supported
            many activities and some were completed a long time before
            the project's closing.
